<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Add dates to event series"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/events/series/add-dates"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Adds additional schedules to an existing event series. This is used to extend recurring or multi-date events without recreating the series.

**Prerequisites**
1. **ParentEventId** - Use [GET /api/v1.0/events/\{EventId\}](/docs/api/events/get-event) to confirm the series parent and extract the `EventId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Get series parent: [GET /api/v1.0/events/\{EventId\}](/docs/api/events/get-event).
2. Build `AdditionalSchedules` entries with new date ranges.
3. Add dates: [POST /api/v1.0/events/series/add-dates](/docs/api/events/add-event-series-dates).

**Minimal Required Fields**: `ParentEventId`, `AdditionalSchedules` (each with `StartDateTime` and `EndDateTime`).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request to add additional dates to an existing event series.","properties":{"ParentEventId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Parent event ID of the series."},"AdditionalSchedules":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","description":"Minimal schedule entry for adding dates to a series.","properties":{"EventId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"StartDateTime":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"},"EndDateTime":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"},"SetupTimeInMinutes":{"type":"integer","nullable":true},"BreakdownTimeInMinutes":{"type":"integer","nullable":true},"SkipAvailabilityCheck":{"type":"boolean"},"OverrideUserId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"searchUsers","endpoint":"POST /api/v1.0/users","responseField":"Items[].UserId"},"description":"UUID of the user (OverrideUserId). Obtain via [POST /api/v1.0/users](/docs/api/users/search-users), extract `Items[].UserId`."},"OverrideDateTime":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","nullable":true},"DoubleBookingStrategy":{"type":"string","enum":["DontAllow","AllowIfSameOwner","Allow"]}},"title":"SlimEventSchedule"}}},"title":"AddEventSeriesDatesRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
